content: Chen Chen's Homepage Chen Chen (éæ¨) Tenure-track Associate Professor, Ph.D. Advisor John Hopcroft Center for Computer Science School of Electronic Information and Electrical Engineering Shanghai Jiao Tong University Email: chen-chen AT sjtu DOT edu DOT cn Office: SEIEE Building 3-301B Short Bio Chen Chen is currently a tenure-track associate professor at John Hopcroft Center for Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, where he is also a member of the Emerging Parallel Computing Center. Prior to that, he worked as a Researcher at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center. In 2018, he obtained the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, under the supervision of Prof. Bo Li and Prof. Wei Wang. During his Ph.D. study, he visited University of Toronto for one semester (hosted by Prof. Baochun Li). He obtained the Bachelor degree in 2014 from Department of Automation, Tsinghua Univerity. Research Interests Distributed Machine Learning, LLM Inference, Cloud Scheduling, Cache Management Openings I am looking for self-motivated undergraduate, Master and PhD students to work with me. Feel free to drop me an email if you are interested. Teaching CS7331, Advanced Computer Architecture (in English), 2022-2023 Spring. SE3357, Operating System (John Class), 2022-2023 Spring.
